message: I'm being fair, but I need most of the money to get started.  Let's get this done quickly!
You're being greedy, I'm willing to compromise
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bigger share to make this work. Let's find a solution that benefits us both.
I'm not budging, but I'm willing to give you a small consolation prize
This is my final offer. I need a good amount to make this worthwhile, but I'm willing to meet you halfway.  Let's end this now.
You're getting desperate, I'm not giving in yet
We're running out of time. This is my final offer, 50/50. Let's agree and get this over with before it's too late.
